ygData.subject: Re: Wee!
ygData.msgSnippet: out of curiousity why Fennin Ro.. (with 2500+ users)?  there are 16+ other servers.  Maybe you have friends there i guess. Vespair ... From: Avron Vallengard
ygData.messageBody:
out of curiousity why Fennin Ro.. (with 2500+ users)? there are 16+ other
servers. Maybe you have friends there i guess.

Vespair


-----Original Message-----
From: Avron Vallengard [mailto:avron@...]
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 11:48 AM
To: EverQuest
Subject: [EverQuest] Wee!


From: Avron Vallengard <avron@...>


Yay! Finally got my copy of EverQuest.. :)
So now I'm not so bummed out anymore.. Just got one problem now..
Someone has taken the name Avron on Fennin Ro.. hehe.. I don't know if you
think that matters but to me it does, I've used Avron for years and now
when I have been waiting for EverQuest the past weeks I have written a
detailed characteristics/history for the character too.. So heh..
Anyways I will try to think up a new name.. But expect to see me out there
on Fennin Ro.. :)

- Avron -
